mapper.sql: id, cname, description, teach_link, create_time, modified_time, is_del, sid
mapper.insert: insert into chapter (id, cname, description, teach_link, create_time, modified_time, is_del, sid) values (#{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{teachLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT}, #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT})

insert into chapter
id,
cname,

teach_link,

modified_time,

sid,

mapper.update:
update chapter
cname = #{cname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
teach_link = #{teachLink,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modified_time = #{modifiedTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_del = #{isDel,jdbcType=BIT},
sid = #{sid,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
